name: Maryanne Tipler
content:
Maryanne Jennifer Tipler ONZM is a New Zealand mathematics educator who has incorporated New Zealand culture into her "43 mathematics textbooks, 28 teacher files and nine homework books for primary, intermediate and secondary students", used in 85% of New Zealand schools.[1]
 Tipler's teacher file NZ Curriculum Mathematics: Connecting All Strands Level 3A won the 2015 Copyright Licensing New Zealand Educational Publishing Award for "Teachers’ Choice: Best Resource in Primary".[2]
Tipler was made an Officer of the New Zealand Order of Merit in the 2019 New Year Honours.[1]
 
 This article about a mathematician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.

raw:
New Zealand mathematics educator


 Tipler in 2019
Maryanne Jennifer Tipler ONZM is a New Zealand mathematics educator who has incorporated New Zealand culture into her "43 mathematics textbooks, 28 teacher files and nine homework books for primary, intermediate and secondary students", used in 85% of New Zealand schools.[1]
Tipler's teacher file NZ Curriculum Mathematics: Connecting All Strands Level 3A won the 2015 Copyright Licensing New Zealand Educational Publishing Award for "Teachers’ Choice: Best Resource in Primary".[2]
Tipler was made an Officer of the New Zealand Order of Merit in the 2019 New Year Honours.[1]

References[edit]


^ a b Eder, Jennifer (31 December 2018), "New Year's honours: The amazing Mrs Tipler recognised for services to maths", Stuff.co.nz

^ "CLNZ Educational Publishing Awards 2015 winners announced", Books+Publishing, 24 November 2015
